As Mr. Sheats said in our @NRDems EJ hearing, part of the solution is for the government to ensure local communities, EJ groups, and Indigenous peoples are a part of the policy implementation and decision making processes through programs like @POTUS‚Äô Justice 40 Initiative.

The Klamath dams in my district are a perfect example. When they were built decades ago, Tribes were left out ‚Äì and they now suffer lost salmon and degraded water quality, devastating their economy and way of life.

We must talk honestly about the racial impacts on environmental justice and work to end it‚Äînot ignore it like my GOP colleagues would prefer. The truth is: people with money and power, who were always white, did what they wanted. And people of color bore the consequences. https://t.co/6ns0aIwFsD

Exciting step forward for a clean energy future. I‚Äôm looking forward to more of these projects to come. https://t.co/jihvK3YMrK
